attributes.action: Stop Dogs being left in the cold weather
attributes.background: After abused dog witness I feel this is right!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you are concerned about abuse or neglect of a specific animal, you can report your concerns to the RSPCA in England or Wales or the SSPCA in Scotland. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/caring-for-pets
